DOC.brief_summary: This is a single patient expanded access, compassionate and non-emergency use study that provides patients with severe asthma, who do not qualify for ongoing clinical trials with dupilumab, access to this investigational treatment.
DOC.detailed_description: This study is being undertaken to determine whether dupilumab has efficacy in extremely severe asthma, and to allow a very severe asthma patient, who has been tried on nearly every immunosuppressive drug, early access to a potentially effective therapy. The patient will continue in the study indefinitely. Safety will be evaluated and serious adverse events will be reported.
DOC.criteria: Sever systemic corticosteroid dependent asthma for more than 5 years Disease other than asthma Circulation eosinophils more than 1500/ul Current smoker or more than 10 pack years
